messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] RE: "dangerous thoughts",teaching other kids
messages.msgSnippet: ... VERY ... or ... and ... Wow Sandra, You wouldn t believe how happy it makes me to hear that you struggled with that too.    I just wish I has convinced
messages.messageBody:
> One of the hardest things I had to get over when I was first homeschooling
> was rejection. If I thought a game or book or puzzle or free concert was
VERY
> cool and my kid (Kirby at first) dragged his feet and looked the other way
or
> just say "I don't like this, mom," I took it personally and felt rejected
and
> incompetent.

Wow Sandra,
You wouldn't believe how happy it makes me to hear that you struggled with
that too. <g> I just wish I has convinced myself not to be that way a lot
earlier.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
